EmailTemplate.description: This is used to send the email template content to Kilbeggan Distillery

EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been assigned to Kilbeggan Distillery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
You have a new case #{!Case.CaseNumber} in the queue.
Thanks
{!Case.Thread_Id}
